effect.sun_moon: fire moves inflict half damage, regardless of target. If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: fire moves inflict half damage, regardless of target. If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: fire moves inflict half damage, regardless of target. If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user soaks the battlefield with water. This weakens Fire-type moves for five turns.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user soaks the battlefield with water. This weakens Fire-type moves for five turns.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user soaks the battlefield with water. This weakens Fire-type moves for five turns.
